fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: European environmental legislation, specifically waste and circular economy policy initiatives, food contact policy and sustainable industry.
organisation_name: The Association of European Producers of Steel for Packaging (APEAL)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical expert group for food contact materials#E03354#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3354#Member#C
goals__remit: The goal of our organisation is to represent the interests of the APEAL member companies, European producers of steel for packaging, to promote steel as a packaging material and inform stakeholders of the performance and sustainable benefits of steel for packaging.
